name: Nashor's Tooth
passive: Icathian Bite: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage based on AP.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Attack Speed, Ability Haste, Attack Damage, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage based on AP.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Perfect for AP champions who auto-attack frequently
Great on champions like Diana, Kayle, or Teemo
The on-hit damage scales with your AP
Helps with taking objectives and split pushing
Consider building this on hybrid damage champions
